## random hex

A random hex value

### Synopsis

A random hex value that is 32 characters long by default. Pass an integer as an argument to change the length to n * 2, e.g. for 10 characters, do `random hex 5`

```
random hex [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for hex
```
